verdict.summary: Built-in punycode module deprecated. Usually caused by a dependency, not your code.

dead_ends.why_fails: Hides all deprecation warnings, including important ones

dead_ends.action: Patch the dependency to remove punycode
dead_ends.why_fails: Fragile and will be overwritten on npm install

workarounds.action: Install the userland punycode package: npm install punycode
Update the dependency that uses punycode — check npm ls punycode
workarounds.how:
npm ls punycode  # find which dependency uses it
npm update <dep>

workarounds.action: This is a warning, not an error — it still works, just update when possible

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'DeprecationWarning' is a deprecation_warning error while 'Error' has a different failure mode despite similar symptoms. Check error message details to differentiate.
